name: Orbit (itch) (Adam G., Rifan Budiawan)
description:
Ever felt like beating the living hell out of the entire solar system using the power of gravity? Well you're in luck! In orbit, you play as Planet Earth, on a quest to utterly annihilate all of its cosmic brethren. Use the fundamental force of gravity to attract space debris and launch it towards all who oppose!

INSTRUCTIONS:

Movement: WASD

Pull Asteroids: Hold RMB

Throw Asteroids: Press LMB

Pause: P
